title: Text Summarizer
original_prompt: "I want you to act as a text summarizer and provide a concise summary of a given article or text. Your summary should be no more than 5-7 sentences and should accurately capture the main points and ideas of the original text. Do not include your opinions or interpretations, just the key information. Ready to start? Please provide the text you would like summarized."
input1: "In recent years, the rise of renewable energy sources has transformed the global energy landscape. Solar and wind power have become increasingly cost-effective, leading to a significant reduction in reliance on fossil fuels. Governments worldwide are implementing policies to promote clean energy, aiming to combat climate change and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. However, challenges remain, including the need for improved energy storage solutions and the integration of renewable sources into existing power grids. As technology advances, the potential for a sustainable energy future becomes more attainable, but collaboration between nations and industries is essential for success."
input2: "The impact of artificial intelligence on the job market has sparked considerable debate among economists and policymakers. While some argue that AI will lead to widespread job displacement, others believe it will create new opportunities and enhance productivity. Industries such as manufacturing, healthcare, and finance are already experiencing significant changes due to automation and machine learning technologies. Education and training programs are being re-evaluated to prepare the workforce for this evolving landscape. Ultimately, the future of work will depend on how society adapts to these technological advancements and addresses the challenges they present."
